accelerometer_publisher.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 from robotic_skin.sensor.lsm6ds3 import LSM6DS3_IMU
2 from time import sleep
3 from sensor_msgs.msg import Imu
4 import rospy
5 import rospkg
6 import argparse
7 
8 if __name__ == "__main__":
9  parser = argparse.ArgumentParser()
10  parser.add_argument('--config_file', action="store",
11  dest="config_file", required=True,
12  help="The configuration yaml file name in package's config folder")
13  args = parser.parse_args()
14  ros_robotic_skin_path = rospkg.RosPack().get_path('ros_robotic_skin')
15  config_file = ros_robotic_skin_path + "/config/" + args.config_file
16  accel_gyro = LSM6DS3_IMU(config_file)
17  rospy.init_node('talker_{imu_number}'.format(imu_number=str(accel_gyro.config_dict['imu_number'])), anonymous=True)
18  pub = rospy.Publisher('/imu_data{imu_number}'.format(imu_number=str(accel_gyro.config_dict['imu_number'])), Imu,
19  queue_size=10)
20  imu_msg = Imu()
21  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
22  accel_gyro_list = accel_gyro.read()
23  imu_msg.header.stamp = rospy.Time.now()
24  imu_msg.linear_acceleration.x = accel_gyro_list[0]
25  imu_msg.linear_acceleration.y = accel_gyro_list[1]
26  imu_msg.linear_acceleration.z = accel_gyro_list[2]
27  imu_msg.angular_velocity.x = accel_gyro_list[3]
28  imu_msg.angular_velocity.y = accel_gyro_list[4]
29  imu_msg.angular_velocity.z = accel_gyro_list[5]
30  pub.publish(imu_msg)
31  # For some reason the rospy sleep doesn't work here
32  # IDK why, so it's better to use python sleep
33  sleep(0.1)
